attributes.action: Petition to stop the UK Police using taser guns.
attributes.additional_details:
There has been several incidents over the past few months of the Police using taser gun's and the person they hit with it dying.

This has to stop, tasers were bought in as a non lethal weapon yet they are killing people not just here in the UK but all over the world.

http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2011/aug/17/man-dies-taser-arrest-cumbria

http://www.sodahead.com/united-states/student-dies-after-police-use-stun-gun-are-tasers-safe/question-2061603/

http://www.infowars.com/man-dies-after-shocked-by-taser-gun/
